DOC.brief_title: Yttrium Y 90 Anti-CD19 Antibody BU-12 Patients With Advanced Relapsed Refractory Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To determine biodistribution indium-111 BU-12 patient refractory CD19+ leukemia . Secondary - To determine maximum tolerate dose yttrium Y 90 anti-CD19 antibody BU-12 - Determine human anti-mouse antibody ( HAMA ) response . - To define , preliminarily , antitumor activity yttrium Y 90 anti-CD19 antibody BU-12 . OUTLINE : Patients receive yttrium Y 90 anti-CD19 antibody BU-12/indium-111 BU-12 IV 60 minute day 0 undergo whole-body imaging day 0 , 1 , 3 , 4 , 7 . Patients also undergo blood collection bone marrow biopsy periodically dosimetry calculation pharmacokinetics . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically 2 year .
